channel.title: Who is Who
channel.description:
dogudez is [url=http://www.moparcraft.net/smf/index.php?action=profile;u=560359]ezioAU[/url] and [url=http://www.moparcraft.net/smf/index.php?action=profile;u=560657]yarrak[/url] has a extremely similar IP as [url=http://www.moparcraft.net/smf/index.php?action=profile;u=559465]yokedici1[/url]. E.G same area. I'll post/upload some of my pictures tomorrow when I wake up (5am here atm).
Was wondering if someone could look into this forum wise because these guys seem to be making more and more accounts.
Their original names are Spelchure,yokedici1,dogudez all 3 of them joined at the same time.

item.title: Who is Who
item.dc:creator: @zuppers zuppers
item.description:
@zuppers wrote:

This isn’t a case of someone getting someone else’s ip, these guys choose similar name format, talk the same, do the same things in the server. These are the guys who don’t understand the rules even after you explain it to them.

Read full topic

item.title: Who is Who
item.dc:creator: @LilXCj LilXCj
item.description:
@LilXCj wrote:

[quote=“Moparisthebest, post:5, topic:434966”]Many IPs are similar, and they will continue getting more and more so as more users are crammed behind the same IP since there are no more IPv4 addresses left for the big guys to assign. Even multiple (different) people on the same IP is fairly common.

Anyhow, if people who are ‘close’ are banned, that’s just cause to watch the other people a little closer than otherwise, but not to ban them.[/quote]

I understood that but my impression was the fact that they are “close” due to IP and they have similar personalities when playing ingame (or at least, that is my impression)

Read full topic

item.title: Who is Who
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

Many IPs are similar, and they will continue getting more and more so as more users are crammed behind the same IP since there are no more IPv4 addresses left for the big guys to assign. Even multiple (different) people on the same IP is fairly common.

Anyhow, if people who are ‘close’ are banned, that’s just cause to watch the other people a little closer than otherwise, but not to ban them.

Read full topic

item.title: Who is Who
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

I’m not sure if you meant to ban them, but I’d rather not.

I don’t believe in banning anyone unless I’m certain they are in breach of the rules, in most cases they’re a group of friends who play together from school, banning them all because of one idiot doesn’t seem very fair.

Honestly, most these people who crop up for me are evading bans from long lengths of time ago so don’t do anything wrong anyway. But if they do they get rebanned anyhow.

Read full topic

item.title: Who is Who
item.dc:creator: @LilXCj LilXCj
item.description:
@LilXCj wrote:

Honestly if they “live” in the same area as these ban evaders, why take any chances?

Read full topic

item.title: Who is Who
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

I’m getting confused and loosing count myself, loads of people e.g. Gravel_Boy have similar IPs to Girlman, and some other guy had a similar IP to him who is linked to girlman who is linked to tons of other accounts who is linked to similar IPs of ban evaders who is then again somewhat linked to a bunch of supposed new people.

It’s getting ridiculous

As for ezioAU:

Members possibly in the same range:
I love EK, eastus, dogudez, erenseen, atkm4lm4l

As for yarrak:
Members possibly in the same range:
forlive

Read full topic
